This unnamed '''woman''' is the daughter of [[Dr. Gettleman]].

==History==
She is mentioned only in "[[The One With The Pediatrician]]" where [[Monica Geller|Monica]] says she saw her last week and said her father was fine and that she, on the other hand, had botched Botox. It appeared that her father was still having [[Ross Geller|Ross]] as a patient which is why he lied to [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]] that Dr. Gettleman possibly died and she told Monica and she thought Ross was getting him confused with his childhood therapist, only for Rachel, Monica and [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]] to find out Ross was still seeing his pediatrician.

==Appearances==
*[[The One With The Pediatrician]] (mentioned)
